location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter asks Bruce to explain his reasons for relieving the Broker at Muscat of his duties. Includes a translation of a letter, dated 16 April 1813, from the Broker in question, Vishundass, to Sir Evan Nepean, Governor of Bombay.
